channel.title: How do i edit my stats?
channel.description: hi ... I'm owner of a server and i don't know how to edit my stats to the max .. plz help me !! :(

item.title: How do i edit my stats?
item.dc:creator: @ShIzNeT ShIzNeT
item.description:
@ShIzNeT wrote:

this is a way faster way…

goto Client.java and add this command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“maxstats”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addSkillXP(999999999, 0);
addSkillXP(999999999, 1);
addSkillXP(999999999, 2);
addSkillXP(999999999, 3);
addSkillXP(999999999, 4);
addSkillXP(999999999, 5);
addSkillXP(999999999, 6);
addSkillXP(999999999, 7);
addSkillXP(999999999, 8);
addSkillXP(999999999, 9);
addSkillXP(999999999, 10);
addSkillXP(999999999, 11);
addSkillXP(999999999, 12);
addSkillXP(999999999, 13);
addSkillXP(999999999, 14);
addSkillXP(999999999, 15);
addSkillXP(999999999, 16);
addSkillXP(999999999, 17);
addSkillXP(999999999, 18);
addSkillXP(999999999, 19);
addSkillXP(999999999, 20);
addSkillXP(999999999, 21);
addSkillXP(999999999, 22);
addSkillXP(999999999, 23);
addSkillXP(999999999, 24);
sendMessage(“message”);

You can change message to anything u want it to say when u type in the code.

Enjoy

item.title: How do i edit my stats?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

motoxman:

hi … I’m owner of a server and i don’t know how to edit my stats to the max … plz help me !!

ok now first go to where ever you installed the file
so for me C:\Program Files\MoparScape\HybridScape\characters then in that are text documents and in there are all the players files
now to change stats you need to change the skills part and ONLY toucth the t numbers on the left
